Sinopse: In Victorian England, sexual repression opens a rift between young couple Constance and Joseph after the birth of their daughter Angelica. As Constance becomes more and more protective of little Angelica, a ghostly predator begins to make its way through the house late at night - ANGELICA is a spellbinding ghost story about desire, repression, and its consequences - The new film by Mitchell Lichtenstein, director of HAPPY TEARS and the cult favorite TEETH.—Pierpoline Films
